Entry.Title: Fury and fruit cake: the grandmas vowing to keep fighting fracking after Lancashire site goes active
Entry.Description: They sing, they wave placards, they drink tea – and these aged activists vow to stop controversial process spreading to more sites across the country, as 12th tremor hits area

Entry.Title: Two restaurant bosses guilty of manslaughter after girl, 15, dies from allergic reaction to takeaway

Entry.Title: Female CEO of Booking.com says governments shouldn't intervene to force businesses to close gender gap
Entry.Description: 'I think if you have political action where they ask for a certain percentage of women then the number really goes down'

Entry.Title: Schoolboy, 15, froze to death after missing bus in Devon, inquest hears

Entry.Title: £500,000 in 28 seconds could be the fastest money Philip Green has ever lost

Entry.Title: Philip Green: Peer who exposed businessman revealed to work for law firm used by Daily Telegraph
Entry.Description: The peer who exposed Philip Green as being at the centre of sexual harassment allegations works for the law firm used by the Daily Telegraph in its court battle against the businessman, it has emerged.
